title: LFT For Free Ward Skin
body:
I need 2 more ranked 5 wins to get the ward skin. The other 2 teams I play on have had people stop playing the game, so its hard to get a group of 5 together.

I can play Top/Supp pretty well. I can also ADC or JG if need be.

Top: {{champion:24}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:122}} 
Supp: {{champion:12}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:98}} 

**Just looking for fun and people willing to play despite losses or rank.** I'm Plat 5 if that matters at all.

I can play most weekdays if given a few days notice. Weekends my availability varies.
I have Curse, Teamspeak and Discord.

If there are others who just want the ward skin too (you need 7 wins and 10 games played), just comment below and we can just start a new team

replies.body: I'm keen if you're playing tonight - i'm support main, mostly Nautilus & Thresh can play others if needed.  Can fill all other lanes reasonably as requires.  I'm Gold 5.  Don't care about rank, just a few wins.  add me - lnf3cti0n (first letter is lower case 'L', not i)
